summary: The first manned expedition to Mars is decimated by an unknown life form which stows away on the rescue ship.
cast: Marshall Thompson|Shirley Patterson|Kim Spalding|Ann Doran|Dabbs Greer|Paul Langton|Robert Bice|Richard Benedict|Richard Hervey|Thom Carney|Ray Corrigan|Stuart Hall|Mike Morelli|Monty O'Grady|Bert Stevens|Pierre Watkin
keywords: exclamation point in title|bomb|illness|alien|man versus monster
title: El terror del más allá
